description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Heart and Mind are travelling across Poland in order to see the Championship. Help them to hit the ball into the goal. The fewer movements you make, the more points you get for each goal. Collect bonuses in order to get additional points. You have to carry out additional tasks at 4 special levels.
